description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国安徽省的省级地方行政机关。
description.en: The provincial-level local administrative organ of Anhui Province, People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任安徽省人民政府省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Governor of the Anhui Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任安徽省人民政府常务副省长。
description.en: Chinese politician, current Executive Vice Governor of the Anhui Provincial People's Government.

description.en: Chinese politician, current Vice Governor of the Anhui Provincial People's Government.

description.en: Chinese politician, current Vice Governor of the Anhui Provincial People's Government.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 安徽省地方国家权力机关。
description.en: The local state power organ of Anhui Province.

nodes.id: 安徽省人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 安徽省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 安徽省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing committee of the Anhui Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在华东地区的中央派出机构。
description.en: The dispatched agency of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China in East China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党安徽省委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党安徽省委员会

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在安徽省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading organ of the Communist Party of China in Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的卓越领导人，曾任中共安徽省委书记、安徽省政府主席。
description.en: An outstanding leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, former Secretary of the CPC Anhui Provincial Committee and Chairman of the Anhui Provincial Government.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军于国共内战末期发动的旨在渡过长江、解放南京及华东地区的战役。
description.en: A military campaign launched by the People's Liberation Army during the late stage of the Chinese Civil War to cross the Yangtze River and liberate Nanjing and East China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期设立的省级行政区，后与皖南人民行政公署合并成立安徽省。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative region established in the early days of the People's Republic of China, later merged with the South Anhui People's Administrative Office to form Anhui Province.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期设立的省级行政区，后与皖北人民行政公署合并成立安徽省。
description.en: A provincial-level administrative region established in the early days of the People's Republic of China, later merged with the North Anhui People's Administrative Office to form Anhui Province.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)

description.zh-cn: 1949年至1954年间中华人民共和国的最高国家政权机关。
description.en: The highest state power organ of the People's Republic of China from 1949 to 1954.

description.zh-cn: 安徽省人民政府在1955年至1968年间的名称。
description.en: The name of the Anhui Provincial People's Government from 1955 to 1968.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间安徽省的最高权力机关。
description.en: The highest organ of power in Anhui Province during the Cultural Revolution.

description.en: The general office of the Anhui Provincial People's Government.

description.en: One of the constituent departments of the Anhui Provincial People's Government, responsible for the province's economic and social development planning.

description.zh-cn: 自2021年2月起担任安徽省人民政府省长。
description.en: Serving as Governor of the Anhui Provincial People's Government since February 2021.

description.zh-cn: 自2025年10月起担任安徽省人民政府常务副省长。
description.en: Serving as Executive Vice Governor of the Anhui Provincial People's Government since October 2025.

description.zh-cn: 自2016年9月起担任安徽省人民政府副省长。
description.en: Serving as Vice Governor of the Anhui Provincial People's Government since September 2016.

description.zh-cn: 自2023年1月起担任安徽省人民政府副省长。
description.en: Serving as Vice Governor of the Anhui Provincial People's Government since January 2023.

description.zh-cn: 自2023年1月起担任安徽省人民政府副省长。
description.en: Serving as Vice Governor of the Anhui Provincial People's Government since January 2023.

description.zh-cn: 自2024年5月起担任安徽省人民政府副省长。
description.en: Serving as Vice Governor of the Anhui Provincial People's Government since May 2024.

description.zh-cn: 自2024年5月起担任安徽省人民政府副省长。
description.en: Serving as Vice Governor of the Anhui Provincial People's Government since May 2024.

description.zh-cn: 自2025年7月起担任安徽省人民政府副省长。
description.en: Serving as Vice Governor of the Anhui Provincial People's Government since July 2025.

description.zh-cn: 自2020年12月起担任安徽省人民政府秘书长。
description.en: Serving as Secretary-General of the Anhui Provincial People's Government since December 2020.

description.zh-cn: 1949年2月16日，中共中央华东局决定设立安徽省人民政府，但后于4月7日中止筹建。
description.en: On February 16, 1949, the East China Bureau of the CPC Central Committee decided to establish the Anhui Provincial People's Government, but preparations were suspended on April 7.

relationships.target: 中国共产党安徽省委员会

description.zh-cn: 1949年2月16日，中共中央华东局决定设立中共安徽省委。
description.en: On February 16, 1949, the East China Bureau of the CPC Central Committee decided to establish the CPC Anhui Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 在安徽省人民政府首次筹建期间被任命为省政府主席。
description.en: Appointed as Chairman of the Provincial Government during the initial preparation for the establishment of the Anhui Provincial People's Government.

relationships.target: 中国共产党安徽省委员会

description.zh-cn: 担任首任中共安徽省委书记。
description.en: Served as the first Secretary of the CPC Anhui Provincial Committee.

description.zh-cn: 作为中共安徽省委书记和省政府主席，负责渡江战役的支前工作。
description.en: As Secretary of the CPC Anhui Provincial Committee and Chairman of the Provincial Government, he was responsible for supporting the Yangtze River Crossing Campaign.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)

description.zh-cn: 1949年4月7日，经中央批准，安徽省人民政府中止筹建。
description.en: On April 7, 1949, with the approval of the Central Government, the preparations for the establishment of the Anhui Provincial People's Government were suspended.

description.zh-cn: 1952年8月7日，皖北人民行政公署与皖南人民行政公署合并，成立安徽省人民政府。
description.en: On August 7, 1952, the North Anhui People's Administrative Office merged with the South Anhui People's Administrative Office to form the Anhui Provincial People's Government.

description.zh-cn: 1952年8月7日，皖南人民行政公署与皖北人民行政公署合并，成立安徽省人民政府。
description.en: On August 7, 1952, the South Anhui People's Administrative Office merged with the North Anhui People's Administrative Office to form the Anhui Provincial People's Government.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)

description.zh-cn: 1952年8月7日，中央人民政府批准撤销皖北、皖南行署，成立安徽省人民政府。
description.en: On August 7, 1952, the Central People's Government approved the dissolution of the North and South Anhui Administrative Offices and the establishment of the Anhui Provincial People's Government.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)

description.zh-cn: 1952年8月7日，中央人民政府批准撤销皖北行署。
description.en: On August 7, 1952, the Central People's Government approved the dissolution of the North Anhui Administrative Office.

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国中央人民政府 (1949年—1954年)

description.zh-cn: 1952年8月7日，中央人民政府批准撤销皖南行署。
description.en: On August 7, 1952, the Central People's Government approved the dissolution of the South Anhui Administrative Office.

description.zh-cn: 1955年3月，安徽省人民政府改组为安徽省人民委员会。
description.en: In March 1955, the Anhui Provincial People's Government was reorganized into the Anhui Provincial People's Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1968年4月，安徽省人民委员会被安徽省革命委员会取代。
description.en: In April 1968, the Anhui Provincial People's Committee was replaced by the Anhui Provincial Revolutionary Committee.

description.zh-cn: 1979年12月，安徽省革命委员会撤销，复设安徽省人民政府。
description.en: In December 1979, the Anhui Provincial Revolutionary Committee was dissolved, and the Anhui Provincial People's Government was re-established.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

description.zh-cn: 安徽省人民政府在业务上接受中华人民共和国国务院的领导。
description.en: The Anhui Provincial People's Government is professionally subordinate to the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 安徽省人民政府在组织上接受安徽省人民代表大会的领导和监督。
description.en: The Anhui Provincial People's Government is organizationally subordinate to and supervised by the Anhui Provincial People's Congress.

relationships.target: 安徽省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 安徽省人民政府在组织上接受安徽省人民代表大会常务委员会的领导和监督。
description.en: The Anhui Provincial People's Government is organizationally subordinate to and supervised by the Standing Committee of the Anhui Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 安徽省人民政府派出机构。
description.en: Dispatched agency of Anhui Provincial People's Government.

relationships.source: 安徽省人民政府驻北京办事处

description.zh-cn: 安徽省人民政府派出机构。
description.en: Dispatched agency of Anhui Provincial People's Government.

relationships.target: 安徽省人民政府办公厅

description.zh-cn: 安徽省人民政府参事室由省政府办公厅管理。
description.en: The Counselor's Office of Anhui Provincial People's Government is managed by the General Office of the Provincial Government.

relationships.source: 安徽省粮食和物资储备局
relationships.target: 安徽省发展和改革委员会

description.zh-cn: 安徽省粮食和物资储备局由省发展改革委管理。
description.en: Anhui Provincial Grain and Material Reserve Bureau is managed by the Provincial Development and Reform Commission.

relationships.target: 安徽省发展和改革委员会

description.zh-cn: 安徽省能源局由省发展改革委管理。
description.en: Anhui Provincial Energy Administration is managed by the Provincial Development and Reform Commission.

description.zh-cn: 安徽省监狱管理局由省司法厅管理。
description.en: Anhui Provincial Prison Administration Bureau is managed by the Provincial Department of Justice.

relationships.source: 安徽省药品监督管理局
relationships.target: 安徽省市场监督管理局

description.zh-cn: 安徽省药品监督管理局由省市场监管局管理。
description.en: Anhui Provincial Medical Products Administration is managed by the Provincial Administration for Market Regulation.

description.zh-cn: 安徽省巢湖管理局为省政府派出机构，由合肥市人民政府管理。
description.en: Anhui Provincial Chaohu Lake Administration is a dispatched agency of the provincial government and is managed by the Hefei Municipal People's Government.
